title: Gender-Based Performance Analysis
description: The school is conducting a gender-based performance analysis. They need to calculate the average score in each subject for male and female students separately. Write a query to calculate the average scores rounded to the nearest integer in Bangla, English, Arts, Math, and Science for each gender, and display the results with the column names `gender`, `avg_bangla`, `avg_english`, `avg_arts`, `avg_math`, and `avg_science`.
hint:
To group by gender, calculate,
Each subject's average, don't be late.
Combine them all in one big sweep,
To get the results that you keep.
